CustomField.description: Tuesday 9 AM Arizona time(This field was created for NPL MA)
CustomField.formula: DATETIMEVALUE( CASE( MOD(WorkDate__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, WorkDate__c +9, 1, WorkDate__c +8, 2, WorkDate__c +7, 3, WorkDate__c +6, 4, WorkDate__c +5, 5, WorkDate__c +4, 6, WorkDate__c +3, WorkDate__c) ) + (9+ Employee__r.Service_Resource__r.Diab_Offset__c) /24
CustomField.label: Default LockoutDate/Time
